TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OperationFlow extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifica il tipo di trasmissione che può essere supportato da un endpoint del servizio Web XML.

span.span: Specifies the type of transmission an endpoint of the XML Web service can support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Sebbene le operazioni di richiesta-risposta o sollecitazione-risposta sono correlate logicamente nel documento Web Services Description Language (WSDL), le informazioni sulla correlazione concreta sarà specificate da un'associazione.Although request-response or solicit-response operations are logically correlated in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, the concrete correlation information will be specified by a binding. Ad esempio, è possono scambiare i messaggi di richiesta e risposta come parte di uno o due trasmissioni HTTP effettive.For example, the request and response messages can be exchanged as part of one or two actual HTTP transmissions. ## Examples L'esempio seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo del `OperationFlow` enumerazione.The following sample demonstrates the use of the `OperationFlow` enumeration. [!code-cpp[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationFlow_Enum/CPP/operationflow_enum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationFlow_Enum/CS/operationflow_enum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationFlow_Enum/VB/operationflow_enum.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow None = int32(0)

summary.span: Indica che l'endpoint del servizio Web XML non riceve trasmissioni.

span.span: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives no transmissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow Notification = int32(2)

summary.span: Indica che l'endpoint del servizio Web XML invia un messaggio.

span.span: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service sends a message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow OneWay = int32(1)

summary.span: Indica che l'endpoint del servizio Web XML riceve un messaggio.

span.span: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives a message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow RequestResponse = int32(3)

summary.span: Indica che l'endpoint del servizio Web XML riceve un messaggio e quindi invia un messaggio correlato.

span.span: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives a message, then sends a correlated message.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow SolicitResponse = int32(4)

summary.span: Indica che l'endpoint del servizio Web XML invia un messaggio e quindi riceve un messaggio correlato.

span.span: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service sends a message, then receives a correlated message.
